stepItems.title: How happy are you with the work completed?

description:
Have you noticed the tiny icons in your browserâ€™s tabs that only appear on certain websites? These are called favicons and it can make your business stand out and help you appear even more professional to your visitors.

As devices like iPhones and iPads become increasingly popular itâ€™s also important to provide an iOS icon to go along with your website. When someone bookmarks your site on their iPad they will be pleasantly surprised to see a beautiful app-like icon appear on their home screen. And theyâ€™ll be happy to keep it there.

To keep consistent with your web presence social media impact should also be considered. With this package you will receive a custom thumbnail image which will appear next to any link that your visitors share on Facebook.

All icons will be designed to match your corporate identity. It can be your logo the first letter of your company name or any other symbol that people associate with your business. A code snippet will also be added to your website header to make sure that all icons are delivered to your visitors.

What can I expect?

  • Retina-ready shortcut icon
  • iOS home screen icon
  • Facebook sharing thumbnail
  • Insert Icons
title: Custom Favicon iOS Icon and Facebook Thumbnail Package
